deleteAccount.title: Bayanin Admin
deleteAccount.subtitle: Duba da sarrafa bayanan asusunku
deleteAccount.warning: Gargaɗi: Wannan aikin na dindindin ne. Da zarar an goge akantarka, duk bayananka, gami da tarihi, bayanan sirri, da saituna, za a cire su na dindindin kuma ba za a iya dawo da su ba.
deleteAccount.reasonPlaceholder: Da fatan za a gaya mana dalilin da yasa kake son goge akantarka...
deleteAccount.confirmCheckbox: Na fahimci cewa wannan aikin ba za a iya sauyawa ba kuma duk bayanana za su bace.
deleteAccount.successMessage: An karɓi buƙatarka ta goge akanta da bayanai. Tawagar mu za ta aiwatar da ita cikin kwanaki 30 daidai da manufofin mu na sirri.
deleteAccount.errorMessage: An sami kuskure wajen gabatar da buƙatarka. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa daga baya ko tuntuɓi tallafi kai tsaye.

findShelter.noSheltersFound: Ba a sami Wuraren Zama ba
findShelter.locationNeededDesc: Don Allah danna 'Yi amfani da wurin da kake a yanzu' don samun kwata.
findShelter.geolocationNotSupportedDesc: Burauzarka ba ta goyan bayan geolocation.
findShelter.unknownCity: Birnin da ba a sani ba
findShelter.unknownState: Jihar da ba a sani ba

sos.title: Bayanin Admin
sos.subtitle: Duba da sarrafa bayanan asusunku
sos.immediateEmergency: Gaggawar da ke barazana ga rayuwa?
sos.clickToInstruction: Danna maballin da ke ƙasa don aika SOS nan take tare da wurinka.
sos.emergencyTypeSelect: Zaɓi nau'in gaggawa don taimakawa masu bada agaji su shirya taimakon da ya dace
sos.additionalInfoDesc: Ba da duk wani ƙarin bayani don taimakawa masu bada agaji su fahimci halin da kake ciki
sos.additionalInfoPlaceholder: Misali, Adadin mutanen da abin ya shafa, bukatun magani, sanannen wuri (landmark)...
sos.locationDesc: Muna buƙatar coordinates ɗinka don aika masu bada agaji
sos.locationAccessRequiredDesc: Don Allah ka bar izinin shiga wurinka don gano matsayinka ta atomatik. Duba burauzarka ko saitin na'urarka.
sos.troubleshootDesc: Idan kana samun kuskuren 'kCLErrorLocationUnknown' ko matsaloli na dindindin:
sos.troubleshootStep1_1: Je zuwa System Settings → Privacy & Security → Location Services.
sos.troubleshootStep1_2: Tabbatar cewa Location Services yana Kunnawa (ON).
sos.troubleshootStep1_3: Tabbatar cewa an kunna Google Chrome.
sos.troubleshootStep2Desc: Kashe Wi-Fi da sake kunna shi na iya taimakawa wajen sabunta wuri.
sos.troubleshootStep3: 3. Yi amfani da Saka Wuri da Hannu
sos.troubleshootStep3Desc: Idan GPS ya ci gaba da kasawa, don Allah yi amfani da zaɓin 'Saka Wuri da Hannu'.
sos.specificAddressPlaceholder: Don Allah ka ba da takamaiman bayanin inda kake a yanzu don taimakawa masu bada agaji su same ka.
sos.noInternetUssd: Babu Yanar Gizo? Yi amfani da USSD
sos.worksOnNetworks: Yana aiki akan MTN, Airtel, Glo, 9mobile
sos.ussdCodesNotAvailable: Lambobin USSD babu su don wurinka.
sos.nextStep1: An aika sanarwarku ga CARITAS da masu bada agajin gaggawa na gida.
sos.nextStep2: Tawagar taimakonmu za ta yi ƙoƙarin tuntuɓar ku nan take.
sos.nextStep3: An tura masu bada agaji zuwa wurin da kake na GPS.
sos.nextStep4: Don Allah ka bar layinka a buɗe kuma ka zauna a wuri mai aminci.
sos.locationPermissionDenied: An hana izinin shiga wuri. Don Allah kunna izinin wuri.
sos.locationUnavailable: Bayanin wuri ba shi da kyauta.
sos.locationRequiredDesc: Don Allah ka bar izinin shiga wuri ko saka adireshinka kafin aika SOS.
sos.detailsRequiredDesc: Don Allah ka ba da jiha da adireshi don saka wuri da hannu.
sos.sosSentDesc: An sanar da masu bada agaji game da halin da kake ciki.
sos.sosFailedDesc: An kasa aika sanarwar SOS. Don Allah gwada lambobin USSD.
